description:
Advanced gamer and streamer, Ji Qing traveled back to the Spring and Autumn Period equipped with a cheater "Shaohao Bone". However, the historical event "The Emperor and the Assassin" somehow succeeded, and the Seven Kingdoms fought for controlling each other, thus wars continued for thousands of years. Ren Yong, a bold man with loyalty and righteousness has also participated in the race. Now, how will "The Eternal Life" Ji Qing show his talents in the turbulent world?

(Source: BilibiliTV)
